showScoreExcerpt:
"'The Audience' is polished to a fault, proceeding with clockwork efficiency from a little comedy to a little drama, from the personal to the political...Not a moment of the play will actually surprise you. But the production of the play is faultless...It's amusing, quietly dramatic, a little informative. I'm quite certain Mirren will enjoy adding a well-deserved Tony to her Oscar and multiple Emmys."
